title: Polar Ionospheric X-ray Imaging Experiment Key Parameters - D. Chenette (Lockheed)

parameters.name: XSA_LOW
parameters.description: Low Energy X-ray Source Array, 64x64 image

parameters.name: XSA_LOW_O
parameters.description: -->  Low Energy X-ray Source Array with geographic map overlay. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['XSA_LOW', 'Geo_Lat_Map', 'Geo_Lon_Map']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: XSA_LOW_Test
parameters.description: [DO NOT USE: UNDER-DEVELOPMENT] -->  Test Display . This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['XSA_LOW', 'Geo_Lat_Map', 'Geo_Lon_Map']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: TXF_LOW
parameters.description: Mean photon intensity over entire image for low energy range

parameters.name: TXF_HIGH
parameters.description: Mean photon intensity over entire image for high energy range
